extendedInfo.description: A Chinese character study tool to be used with Heisig & Richardson's 2-volume series:"Remembering Traditional Hanzi"You can review each lesson's characters, their keywords and associated pinyin.Studying Simplified Hanzi?Check out Heisig Helper Simplified!å¥½å¥½å­¸å¤©å¤©ä¸ï¼

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Would be nice if it was a bit more polished - e.g. allowing to set a font. The one used is very blocky and doesn\'t give a very good indication of the strokes.
reviews.author: Stefan Doll

reviews.comment: A great companion to the book. Thanks :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good amount of Hanzi
reviews.comment: This apphas plenty of Hanzi to keep you busy The only thing missing are the actual written stroke order guide, and usage examples.
reviews.author: A Google User
